org.mini2Dx.core.graphics

Class RepeatedNinePatch

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.graphics.NinePatch
      • org.mini2Dx.core.graphics.RepeatedNinePatch

  • public class RepeatedNinePatch
extends NinePatch
    An implementation of NinePatch that repeats instead of stretches

    • Constructor Detail

      • RepeatedNinePatch

        public RepeatedNinePatch(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture texture,
                         int left,
                         int right,
                         int top,
                         int bottom)
        Create a RepeatedNinePatch by cutting up the given texture into nine patches. The subsequent parameters define the 4 lines that will cut the texture region into 9 pieces.
        Parameters:
        left - Pixels from left edge.
        right - Pixels from right edge.
        top - Pixels from top edge.
        bottom - Pixels from bottom edge.

      • RepeatedNinePatch

        public RepeatedNinePatch(TextureRegion region,
                         int left,
                         int right,
                         int top,
                         int bottom)
        Create a RepeatedNinePatch by cutting up the given texture region into nine patches. The subsequent parameters define the 4 lines that will cut the texture region into 9 pieces.
        Parameters:
        left - Pixels from left edge.
        right - Pixels from right edge.
        top - Pixels from top edge.
        bottom - Pixels from bottom edge.
